content:
# It appears that the furnace has successfully produced 9 iron plates, but it has run out of iron ore to continue smelting.
# Additionally, the attempt to harvest more iron ore failed because there was nothing within reach to harvest, likely indicating that I have already harvested all available iron ore from that patch.

# To resolve this, I need to locate another iron ore patch nearby. 
# Let's find the nearest iron ore resource again and move to that location.

# Locate the nearest iron ore patch.
new_iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(new_iron_ore_position)  # Move to the new location of iron ore
harvest_resource(new_iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Attempt to harvest 10 units of iron ore

# After harvesting, I will insert the iron ore back into the furnace for smelting.
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()} after attempting to gather more resources.")  # Check inventory after harvesting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities once again.
